name: health-monitoring-system
description: Real-time health monitoring system for APIs and websites

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../worker && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:worker" "npm run start:frontend"
